fact_check_explanation_title: Up to 260 UK patients per year experience vision loss because of healthcare delays
fact_check_explanation_summary: Glaucoma is the most common main diagnosis for such patients.

fact_check_explanation_title: Finland is not going to have a four-day working week.
fact_check_explanation_summary: The claim came from an informal proposal made by the Prime Minister when she was Minister of Transport.

fact_check_explanation_title: Migration drives the majority of UK population growth—exactly how much is debatable
fact_check_explanation_summary: Migration to and from the UK has directly accounted for about 60% of UK population growth since the turn of the century, or higher if you try to count the …

fact_check_explanation_title: Spectator report on the effect of the sugar tax needs more context
fact_check_explanation_summary: The Spectator said the “achievement” of the sugar tax is an increase in sugar consumption. This data referred to food which isn’t covered by the tax. Sugar consumption in drink …

fact_check_explanation_title: Boris Johnson’s first interview of 2020: fact checked
fact_check_explanation_summary: The Prime Minister repeated a number of claims about the NHS and policing which we’ve looked at before.

fact_check_explanation_title: State spending isn’t at a record high when you consider the size of the economy
fact_check_explanation_summary: Public spending amounts to around 40% of the size of the economy. It’s been smaller before. It’s also been bigger before.

fact_check_explanation_title: Poll shows public thinks Brexit and NHS are most important issues facing the country
fact_check_explanation_summary: A survey reported by the Mail found social care to be the most pressing issue for the new government, but only among a selective list.

fact_check_explanation_title: How long do murderers serve in prison?
fact_check_explanation_summary: Over half of murderers released from prison have served between 11 and 18 years in custody.

fact_check_explanation_title: This video does not show an official alert siren playing in London
fact_check_explanation_summary: The UK’s siren system has been decommissioned since 1992.

fact_check_explanation_title: This video does not show a real nuclear attack alert
fact_check_explanation_summary: The original video was made just for fun.

fact_check_explanation_title: Not every Nando’s UK restaurant is halal
fact_check_explanation_summary: Not every Nando’s UK restaurant is halal. An ad claiming this was for its Singapore restaurants.

fact_check_explanation_title: Claim that 500,000 people who haven’t paid any UK tax sign up with GPs per year is wrong
fact_check_explanation_summary: Immigrants who do sign up with GPs have almost certainly paid UK tax.
